visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should include monthly rainfall data for a year. Custom colors should be used for the series, and additional configurations should include chart margins, background, and legend settings.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a spline chart titled 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The chart type is set to 'spline', and the title is styled with a specific color and font size. The x-axis represents the months with styled labels and a title, while the y-axis represents the rainfall in millimeters, also with styled labels and a title. The data series includes monthly rainfall data for a year, with a custom color applied to the series. Additional configurations include settings for chart margins, background color, and legend styling to ensure a visually appealing and informative chart.
